snippet.title: Official Infinite Blue Trailer
snippet.description:
“Infinite Blue” is a chat-based otome game, or romance visual novel, that will be released for iOS and Android platforms in 2023. The premise is that you, along with six strangers, have a messenger app mysteriously downloaded onto your phones. In the course of 10 real-time, you have the opportunity to grow close to these strangers, learn why the app was installed, and possibly find love!

Song and lyrics by Faefield Productions: https://faefieldproductions.com/
Ft. the voices of Scott Sherman, Orpheo Fenn, Mylo Reid, Lou Fox, Mike Young, John Q Kubin, Eli Brennan

Website: https://www.velvetfoxgames.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/VelvetFoxGames
Tumblr: https://velvetfoxgames.tumblr.com/
